amendment.description: To require warning labels on sexually explicit commercial e-mail.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1894 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1894 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Enzi. (consideration: CR S13035-13037, S13039-13040; text: CR S13035) To require warning labels on sexually explicit commercial e-mail.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1894 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1894 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Enzi.
